
                            
                            <p>广东农行数币支付，买50亿卡或充50话费，叠加-7，活动一如图1，就在农行app顶端横幅，掌银支付享立减，这个活动过去最低5，有时20，现在只减2，然后叠加广东农行的数币红包，如图2,在首页城市专区，数惠农行,以前也是最低10，经常20，现在只有5了，两个叠加以后50减7。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/06/164235iu7ibpxgdordiug5.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/06/164235iu7ibpxgdordiug5.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/06/164247hgrzk38q1kp3t6wo.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/06/164247hgrzk38q1kp3t6wo.jpg"> <br>  <br>  </p>
